name: Vigorous Health
summary: Your physique is robust and can withstand blood loss startlingly well.
description:
Your physique is robust and can withstand blood loss startlingly well. Whenever you would gain the drained condition, you can attempt a DC 17 flat check. On a success, you donâ€™t gain the drained condition.Traits
